title: LimaLima Men's Funny Novelty Saggy Balls Crew Socks
features: QUALITY: 80% combed cotton. Providing a softer, comfortable feel and greater durability making them less prone to fraying and tearing. 17% polyester, 3% Spandex
SIZE: One size fits all men. Socks measure 22cm (foot length) x 24cm (height of leg) Standard cuffs, mid calf
OCCASION: Perfect for all. Can be worn with shoes, trainers, sandals etc
DESIGN: Funny rude silly novelty design for men. Perfect for Birthday, Christmas or Valentine's gift ideas
WASHING: Machine or hand wash. Wash at 30Â°
description: We have never been fans of the boring card, it's somewhat satisfying to get a giggle off the recipient and Lima Lima came about after several frustratingly fruitless searches for funny cards to send .. we gave up the search and created our own. It is all about banter, silliness and insults... all tongue in cheek of course, and if you can't find what you are looking for drop us a line! We add new designs as frequently as we think of them - and we are always thinking of them, it may seem as though we are crazy ... and that is because we kind of are (in a good way of course). You can imagine what the office is like, we would invite you to visit but you would probably never leave ever again and we are getting quite crowded now.
